valueProposition.question: What is a value proposition canvas?
valueProposition.answer: A value proposition canvas is a visual tool that helps businesses design products and services that customers really want.

difference.question: How is D'AI Vinci different from other strategy tools?
difference.answer: D'AI Vinci stands out with its integrated AI assistant, which provides personalized suggestions and real-time analysis for your business strategies.

multipleProjects.question: Can I work on multiple projects?
multipleProjects.answer: Yes, our paid plans allow you to create and manage multiple projects and strategic canvases simultaneously.

cta.title: Start creating winning strategies today
cta.description: Join thousands of companies already using D'AI Vinci to drive their success

dashboard.subscriptionThankYou: Your account has been updated. Thank you for your subscription!
dashboard.upgradeToPremium: Upgrade to Premium for unlimited canvases, PDF export, AI assistant, and more features!
dashboard.noCanvases: No canvases yet. Create your first one!

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.description: Value Canvas is a comprehensive tool designed to help you create and manage various types of business analysis canvases. It allows you to visualize, analyze, and improve your business strategies in a structured and efficient manner.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: The dashboard is your starting point. Here you can:
features: Create new canvases of different types

canvasTypes.title: Canvas Types
canvasTypes.description: Value Canvas supports multiple types of business analysis tools:

businessModel.title: Business Model Canvas
businessModel.description: Visualize and analyze your complete business model.

valueProposition.title: Value Proposition Canvas
valueProposition.description: Focus on your value proposition and product-market fit.

empathyMap.title: Empathy Map
empathyMap.description: Gain insights into your customers' thoughts, feelings, and behaviors.

swot.title: SWOT Analysis
swot.description: Evaluate the Strengths, Weaknesses, Opportunities, and Threats of your business.

pestel.title: PESTEL Analysis
pestel.description: Analyze external factors affecting your business: Political, Economic, Social, Technological, Environmental, and Legal.

creatingEditing.title: Creating and Editing Canvases
creatingEditing.description1: When creating a new canvas or editing an existing one, you'll see specific sections based on the type of canvas you're working on. Each canvas type has its unique structure and focus areas.
creatingEditing.description2: Each section has an "Add Element" button to include new items. You can also edit or delete existing elements within each section.

canvasInfo.title: Canvas Information
canvasInfo.description1: At the top of each canvas, you can edit the following information:
canvasInfo.description2: This information helps you organize and identify your different canvases across various projects and analyses.

exportPdf.title: Export to PDF
exportPdf.description: You can export any of your canvases to a PDF file for easy sharing or printing. Look for the "Export PDF" button at the top of your canvas.

aiAssistant.title: AI Assistant
aiAssistant.description: The AI button, located in the bottom right corner of the canvas editing screen, provides intelligent assistance to enhance your canvas creation process, regardless of the type of analysis you're working on.

features.title: Features:
list: Generates ideas for each section of your canvas
Analyzes your current canvas and suggests improvements
Answers questions about the methodology of each canvas type
Offers comparative analysis between different canvas types

aiAssistant.usage: To use the AI assistant, click on the purple button with the sparkles icon. Then, you can type your question or request, and the AI will provide relevant suggestions and insights tailored to the specific canvas you're working on.

canvasExamples.title: Canvas Examples
canvasExamples.description: Access a variety of canvas examples from well-known companies to inspire you and better understand how to apply these tools to different types of businesses.

tips.title: Tips for Effective Use
list: Regularly update your canvases as your business strategies evolve
Use multiple canvas types to gain a comprehensive view of your business
Leverage the AI assistant for inspiration and deeper insights
Export to PDF for presentations, team discussions, or stakeholder meetings
Use the comments section to note important decisions, changes, or action items
Compare and contrast insights from different canvas types to inform your strategy

needHelp.title: Need Help?
needHelp.description: If you have any questions or need further assistance with any of the canvas types or features, don't hesitate to contact our support team or use the AI assistant for guidance. We're here to help you make the most of your business analysis tools!

canvasWrapper.pleaseLogin: Please log in to access this page.
canvasWrapper.upgradeForAI: Please upgrade to a premium subscription to use the AI Assistant feature.
canvasWrapper.upgradeForPDF: Please upgrade to a premium subscription to use the Export PDF feature.
canvasWrapper.upgradeForExamples: Please upgrade to a premium subscription to view example canvases.

aiChat.title: AI Assistant
aiChat.initialMessage: Hello! I'm your AI assistant. I have information about your current canvas. How can I help you today?
aiChat.prompt:
Based on the following canvas content, please answer this question or provide insights: {{inputMessage}}

Canvas Content: {{canvasContent}}
aiChat.errorMessage: I apologize, there was an error processing your message. Please try again.

revenueStreams.description: For what value are your customers really willing to pay?

hear.title: Hear?

sayAndDo.description: What does your user say and do?
